QuestData.Title: On to the Bulwark
QuestData.Description: $n, while you and the pridelings were taking care of the skymaster, Lakota Windsong came by. She told me to tell you to meet her east at the Twilight Bulwark.$B$BThat must be where they're holding Magatha Grimtotem.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Lakota Windsong at the Twilight Bulwark in Thousand Needles.
QuestData.RewardText: I'm glad that you made it.$B$BDon't mind my new clothes. It seemed prudent to blend in.
